node.name: CC1988 WBA
node.rich_text: • Sensor for pallet presence • mission handled by lgv manager • drop to inbound conveyor •
• camera detect pallet data • LPN • SKU • Quantity • Lot • shape control • width • length • weight • height • overhangs •
• wmsoffering • mission handled by sdm • putaway rules • ABC classification • minimize mission time • ensure to share items between different aisles • in case of carwash drop pallet to outbound
